line.text: UT: Captain's Log: *static* Our ship has taken heavy damage from Apocalypse's fighters. I don't know how much more she can take, but blast-it if she didn't put up a good fight! I lost count how many of Apocalypse's fighters we took out... The Brotherhood should be proud of... *explosion* That's it! We're goin' down! All hands - BRACE FOR IMPACT...!
